leukapp.apps.specimens.constants module¶

This module contains the specimens app constants. Information that isn’t likely to change and that is used across the specimens app and the leukapp project should be stored here.

Important

DO NOT change any constant unless you know what you are doing.

APP_NAME = 'specimens'¶

Application’s name.

LEUKID_SOURCE_TYPE = {'NORMAL': 'N', 'TUMOR': 'T'}¶

Characters used in the leukid to describe the Specimen’s source_type attribute.

PERMISSION_DENIED_MESSAGE = " You don't have permission to perform this action, please contact a\n Leukgen Administrator. "¶

Permission denied message.

SOURCE = (('BLOOD', 'BLOOD'), ('NAILS', 'NAILS'), ('BUCCAL', 'BUCCAL'), ('HAIR', 'HAIR'), ('TCELLS', 'TCELLS'))¶

List of value, verbose_name pairs for the source attribute.

SOURCE_TYPE = (('TUMOR', 'TUMOR'), ('NORMAL', 'NORMAL'))¶

List of value, verbose_name pairs for the source_type attribute.

SOURCE_TYPE_VALUE = ['TUMOR', 'NORMAL']¶

Values for the source_type attribute.

SOURCE_VALUE = ['BLOOD', 'NAILS', 'BUCCAL', 'HAIR', 'TCELLS']¶

Values for the source attribute.

SPECIMEN_CHOICES = {'SOURCE_TYPE': (('TUMOR', 'TUMOR'), ('NORMAL', 'NORMAL')), 'SOURCE': (('BLOOD', 'BLOOD'), ('NAILS', 'NAILS'), ('BUCCAL', 'BUCCAL'), ('HAIR', 'HAIR'), ('TCELLS', 'TCELLS'))}¶

Dictionary including all Specimen's choices.

SPECIMEN_CREATE_FIELDS = ('individual', 'source', 'source_type', 'ext_id', 'order')¶

Fields required to create a new instance.

SPECIMEN_CREATE_PERMISSIONS = ('specimens.add_specimen',)¶

Tuple of permissions required to create a new instance.

SPECIMEN_CREATE_URL = 'specimens:create'¶

Create URL reverse string.

SPECIMEN_LIST_URL = 'specimens:list'¶

List URL reverse string.

SPECIMEN_UNIQUE_TOGETHER = ('individual', 'ext_id', 'source_type')¶

Fields that are required to be unique together.

SPECIMEN_UPDATE_FIELDS = ('source',)¶

Enabled fields to update an existing instance.

SPECIMEN_UPDATE_PERMISSIONS = ('specimens.change_specimen',)¶

Tuple of permissions required to update an existing instance.

SUCCESS_MESSAGE = 'Looking good'¶

Sucess message.
